## Build class

Webpack configuration builder class

Signature:

```typescript
export declare class Build extends Service implements Contract.Interface
```

Extends: Service

Implements: Contract.Interface

## Properties

| Property                                | Modifiers | Type    | Description      |
| --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- | ---------------- |
| [items](/api/bud-build/build/items)     |           | Items   | Registered items |
| [loaders](/api/bud-build/build/loaders) |           | Loaders |                  |
| [rules](/api/bud-build/build/rules)     |           | Rules   | Registered rules |

## Methods

| Method                                                      | Modifiers | Description                                    |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| [init()](/api/bud-build/build/init)                         |           | Initialize the build rules, loaders, items     |
| [make()](/api/bud-build/build/make)                         |           | Make webpack configuration                     |
| [register()](/api/bud-build/build/register)                 |           | Service register event                         |
| [registered()](/api/bud-build/build/registered)             |           | Service booted event                           |
| [writeFinalConfig()](/api/bud-build/build/writefinalconfig) |           | Write final configuration to storage directory |
